All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, org.gjt.sp.jedit.gui.DefaultFocusComponent
public class SourceTree
extends SideKickTree

Version:
$Revision: 16705 $ The Structure Browser dockable. Extends the SideKick structure browser, adding a popup menu for marker setting and enhanced keyboard handling It replaces the SideKickTree dockable if desired.
Author:
Martin Raspe
